Title: Artificial Intelligence Developer
HTML:
Vuoi far parte di un team che ogni giorno porta l'innovazione digitale nelle imprese, collabora con player di mercato italiani e stranieri e individua soluzioni 'agili' ai problemi delle aziende? Project - Innovation Company √® il posto giusto per te.

Abbiamo l‚Äôambizioso obiettivo di diventare il System Integrator #1 in Italia e per questo motivo siamo costantemente alla ricerca di nuovi talenti con una spiccata propensione all‚Äôinnovazione, alla crescita professionale e al lavoro in team.

Metti in campo le tue skills per raggiungere insieme questo traguardo e unisciti agli oltre 700 collaboratori che lavorano con i pi√π importanti vendor tecnologici a livello mondiale, sar√† per te un‚Äôopportunit√† unica di crescita professionale e umana.


La figura inserita all‚Äôinterno del gruppo che si occupa di sviluppare la linea di prodotti AI-powered di Project Informatica, si occuper√† di supportare la progettazione e lo sviluppo di software basati su intelligenza artificiale in ambiente Microsoft Azure.

La figura inserita si occuper√†, nello specifico, di:

  • Collaborare attivamente nelle attivit√† di progettazione e sviluppo implementazione di soluzioni cloud native;
  • Ideare assieme al team una strategia algoritmica/funzionale per raggiungere gli obiettivi del cliente
  • Collaborare con il team nello sviluppo di codice mediante l‚Äôutilizzo di librerie e framework opensource e contribuendo contestualmente all‚Äôottimizzazione dei processi;
  • Gestire progetti stimolanti e all'avanguardia nel campo dell'intelligenza artificiale, contribuendo al successo dei nostri clienti, seguendone il ciclo vitale di implementazione ed ottimizzazione e promuovendo la contaminazione tecnica tra i componenti del team.


Desideriamo entrare in contatto con risorse in possesso dei seguenti requisiti:

  • Giovani dotati di dinamicit√†, intraprendenza e senso dell‚Äôinnovazione;
  • Laurea in discipline tecnico-scientifiche o esperienza equivalente;
  • Curiosit√† nell‚Äôesplorazione di nuove tecnologie e creativit√† nell‚Äôapproccio a problemi;
  • Mindset in grado di coniugare le esigenze di business con quelle tecniche.


Le competenze tecniche richieste sono:

  • Comprovata esperienza nella progettazione e sviluppo di soluzioni basate su Cloud Microsoft Azure;
  • Comprovata esperienza nello sviluppo back-end o full-stack;
  • Ottima conoscenza di Python o pi√π linguaggi di programmazione;
  • Buona conoscenza delle principali librerie di machine learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch, ect..);
  • Esperienza consolidata con architettura a microservizi e distribuite;
  • Buona conoscenza di strumenti di versioning e CI (GITLab preferibile);
  • Buona conoscenza di sistemi di build/packaging;
  • Buona conoscenza di paradigma REST e SOAP per l'implementazione e fruizione di servizi;
  • Esperienza nella progettazione e implementazione di API;
  • Conoscenza dei principali DB SQL e NoSql;
  • Design pattern di sviluppo.


Costituiscono un plus:

  • Conoscenza di pi√π ambienti Cloud (AWS, GCP, IBM) e dei servizi rivolti all‚ÄôAI
  • Conoscenza di Docker e della programmazione a container
  • Conoscenza di orchestratori quali Openshift o Kubernetes
  • Certificazioni in ambito MS Azure o Artificial Intelligence


Flessibilit√† e proattivit√† e voglia di fare la differenza completano il profilo.


Caratteristiche dell‚Äôambiente di lavoro e cosa offriamo:

  • Viene garantito un adeguato percorso formativo in grado di garantire l'acquisizione continua di nuove competenze e certificazioni;
  • Contratto a tempo indeterminato;
  • PC e telefono
  • Sede di lavoro: Stezzano (BG) o Vimercate (MB), modalit√† ibrida.


L‚Äôofferta si intende rivolta a candidati ambosessi, nel rispetto del D.Lgs. n. 198/2006 e ss.mm.ii. e dei Decreti Legislativi n. 215 e n. 216 del 2003 sulle parit√† di trattamento. Prestiamo attenzione e sensibilit√† ai/alle candidati/e appartenenti alle categorie protette, ai sensi dell'articolo 1 della legge 68/99. I dati personali saranno trattati in conformit√† alle disposizioni contenute nel regolamento UE 2016/679.

Title: Data Scientist - Generative AI Specialist
Description:
DATA SCIENTIST ‚Äì GENERATIVE AI SPECIALIST

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sar√† la tua sfida?

Bip ha creato all‚Äôinterno del proprio Competence Centre ‚ÄúxTech‚Äù il pi√π nutrito gruppo di Data Scientist in Italia (fonte: statistiche LinkedIn), e dall‚ÄôItalia coordina anche i propri gruppi di Data Scientist locali presso le proprie sedi estere.

Nell‚Äôambito della continua crescita ed evoluzione di questo effervescente gruppo, che opera sui nostri clienti in tutti i settori, e ci ha consentito di introdurre l‚ÄôIntelligenza Artificiale presso le realt√† enterprise pi√π importanti d‚ÄôItalia, siamo alla ricerca sia di profili junior/intermediate (dai neolaureati a profili con almeno 2 anni di esperienza), sia profili middle-senior (dai 3 ai 6 anni di esperienza). La provenienza da societ√† di consulenza direzionale o informatica sar√† considerata un forte plus.

Il/La Generative AI Specialist in Bip evolve non solo le proprie competenze nei modelli di Generative AI, ma anche la comprensione dei fenomeni legati al Business dei nostri Clienti e le proprie capacit√† di tradurli in soluzioni e poi di comunicare e utilizzare i risultati degli stessi per migliorare ed efficientare i processi.

I/Le nostri/e Generative AI Specialists verranno introdotti in contesti progettuali dove per la maggior parte i dati sono non strutturati (testi, immagini, video, suoni) e il cui focus diventa la comprensione, il processamento e la generazione partendo da tali basi documentali altrimenti non processabili con le classiche tecniche di Data Science.

I contesti progettuali spaziano dall‚Äôutilizzo di modelli pre-addestrati (es. LLM) fino all‚Äôaddestramento di nuovi modelli di Generative AI passando dal fine-tuning e absorption learning da modelli commerciali.

Oltre alle progettualit√†, ai/alle Generative AI Specialist sar√† richiesto un contributo attivo per alimentare la Community con attivit√† di ricerca, scouting, concept di nuove soluzioni e business development.

Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team?

Requisiti indispensabili:


Laurea Specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Matematica, Informatica, Statistica o discipline affini (STEM);
Forte approccio quantitativo e brillanti doti analitiche;
Passione e competenza in ambito data exploration, analisi dati e creazione di modelli: il nostro team disegna e sviluppa sistemi a supporto di decisioni strategiche per il business;
Competenze statistiche, di Data Mining, Machine Learning,¬†Deep Learning;
Solida conoscenza e comprovata esperienza in programmazione e scripting Python
Esperienza con strumenti di version control (es.¬†Git);
Conoscenza approfondita di database relazionali e di costrutti SQL e SQL Programming;
Conoscenza di database non relazionali (es.¬†elasticsearch,¬†mongodb,¬†redis);
Conoscenza di database vettoriali (es. ChromaDB, QDrant, Pinecone, ...)
Conoscenza e l‚Äôutilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale di almeno uno tra i principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS)
Conoscenza tecniche di processamento¬†dati non strutturati;
Conoscenza approfondita di¬†Natural Language Processing (NLP),¬†Computer Vision¬†e relative tecniche (Text Categorization, Entity Extraction, Generation, Object Detection, Object Segmentation)
Esperienza su Reti Neurali,¬†Convolutional Neural Network,¬†Transformers;
Conoscenza di tecniche di Generative AI e dei principali¬†Large Language Models¬†(LLM)
Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA, ‚Ä¶)
Conoscenza delle principali librerie di processamento dati non strutturati (tensorflow,¬†torch,¬†pytorch) e repository di modelli (huggingface)
Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di prompting (es. one/few-shot, chain-of-thought)
Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali


Plus:


Conoscenza di strumenti di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
Esperienza nello sviluppo e applicazione di modelli di Generative AI in contesti industriali
Esperienza nello sviluppo software e conoscenza approfondita del ciclo di vita del software
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli¬†(es., ¬†MLFlow, DVC)
Utilizzo di reti generative per la produzione controllata di contenuto (testo, immagini, video)
Sviluppo di Motori di Ricerca, Entity Extraction, Anomaly Detection su immagini
Conoscenza principali modelli di Explainable AI (SHAP, Lime, Anchors)
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:


Standing consulenziale
Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze


Perch√® Bip?

People at¬†the¬†center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialit√† e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP √® un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti.¬†

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilit√† di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivit√† e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l‚Äôautonomia e la capacit√† di assumerti responsabilit√† e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all‚Äôavanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking¬†fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunit√† di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversit√† e all‚Äôinclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrit√† e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, pi√π ampi.

Promuoviamo l‚Äôinserimento e l‚Äôintegrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette ‚Äì in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 ‚Äì.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se c‚Äô√® un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

L‚Äôiter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

L‚Äôordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunit√† future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l‚Äôesperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l‚Äôinnovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualit√† su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell‚Äôeccellenza, che √® la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di¬†lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

  • Conoscenza approfondita di database relazionali e di costrutti SQL e SQL Programming;
  • Conoscenza di database non relazionali (es. elasticsearch, mongodb, redis);
  • Conoscenza di database vettoriali (es. ChromaDB, QDrant, Pinecone, ...)
  • Conoscenza e l‚Äôutilizzo di API Cloud di Intelligenza Artificiale di almeno uno tra i principali cloud provider (Google, Microsoft, AWS)
  • Conoscenza tecniche di processamento dati non strutturati;
  • Conoscenza approfondita di Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision e relative tecniche (Text Categorization, Entity Extraction, Generation, Object Detection, Object Segmentation)
  • Esperienza su Reti Neurali, Convolutional Neural Network, Transformers;
  • Conoscenza di tecniche di Generative AI e dei principali Large Language Models (LLM)
  • Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA, ‚Ä¶)
  • Conoscenza delle principali librerie di processamento dati non strutturati (tensorflow, torch, pytorch) e repository di modelli (huggingface)
  • Conoscenza delle principali tecniche di prompting (es. one/few-shot, chain-of-thought)
  • Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali


Plus:
  • Conoscenza di strumenti di containerizzazione (Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo e applicazione di modelli di Generative AI in contesti industriali
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo software e conoscenza approfondita del ciclo di vita del software
  • Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (es.,  MLFlow, DVC)
  • Utilizzo di reti generative per la produzione controllata di contenuto (testo, immagini, video)
  • Sviluppo di Motori di Ricerca, Entity Extraction, Anomaly Detection su immagini
  • Conoscenza principali modelli di Explainable AI (SHAP, Lime, Anchors)
  • Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:
  • Standing consulenziale
  • Ottime doti relazionali e comunicative
  • Orientamento al cliente e al raggiungimento degli obiettivi
  • Buona attitudine a lavorare in team
  • Precisione e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze


Perch√® Bip?

People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialit√† e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP √® un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilit√† di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attivit√† e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l‚Äôautonomia e la capacit√† di assumerti responsabilit√† e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all‚Äôavanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo l‚Äôunicit√† e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunit√† di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversit√† e all‚Äôinclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrit√† e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, pi√π ampi.

Promuoviamo l‚Äôinserimento e l‚Äôintegrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette ‚Äì in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 ‚Äì.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prendere
mo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se c‚Äô√® un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all‚Äôinterno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

L‚Äôiter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

L‚Äôordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunit√† future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l‚Äôesperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l‚Äôinnovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze pi√π all‚Äôavanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualit√† su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell‚Äôeccellenza, che √® la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.

Title: Data Scientist - International Analytics Team
Description:
Got the drive to shape the future of insurance?

At Prima, you could take on a whole new challenge. As part of our global community, you‚Äôd be in the driving seat of your career; learning and growing with a top-tier team around you. Prima is a place where no matter who you are or what your role is ‚Äî your voice is valued.

Back in 2015, we embarked on a mission: to provide great value car insurance that is designed for everyone. And we‚Äôve come a long way, we‚Äôve created a culture where we can fuel each other‚Äôs success. But we need your expertise, as we steer things in a new and exciting direction.

You‚Äôre probably thinking‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúThat sounds pretty good‚Äù. We agree.

Meet the orchestrators of our global symphony. This team doesn't just manage complexity; they turn it into an efficient, proactive system. Empowering every country to swiftly spot improvement opportunities, they play a vital role in crafting and executing the Pricing and Underwriting strategy. Step into the heartbeat of our global enterprise!

As well as great colleagues and engaging projects, there are loads of ways we can help you do the best work of your life. We‚Äôve shaped our offering to place a focus on wellbeing, autonomy and development. We see benefits as the fuel that will empower you to succeed, if you decide to embark on this journey with us.

ü§∏üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Working in a way that works for you

We believe in work-life balance and flexibility. Whether you like working from the office, home or a mixture of both. We‚Äôll help you find a balance that works best for you. We even have a policy that means you can work from any location for 30 days a year. We trust you to steer us forward.

üèÅ The freedom to explore the possibilities

We may move fast at Prima, but we move together. We‚Äôre invested in your growth; so we‚Äôll give you access to a teaching and learning marketplace. And you‚Äôll have regular sessions with your manager to establish a personal growth plan.

üåà Our winning formula: happy and high-performing

From private medical insurance to discounted gym memberships and wellbeing initiatives: we‚Äôre here to support you. We know how important your health and well-being is, so we‚Äôll go the extra mile to help you when we can.

If it sounds like we‚Äôve got something that‚Äôs up your street, let‚Äôs see if you‚Äôve got the skills we‚Äôre looking for!

As Data Scientist , some of your activities will be:


Design, build and evolve Prima‚Äôs proprietary predictive technology, in topics such as the prediction of future claims, renewal probability, customer lifetime value‚Ä¶;
Develop a strong critical spirit and creativity that can act as an engine for Prima's growth;
Learn avidly with the support of experienced colleagues and grow quickly, assuming more responsibilities within the team.


Are you the ideal candidate for this exciting role? Here's what we're looking for:


Impressive academic achievements in Mathematics, Computer science, Physics, Statistics, Mathematical Engineering, Physical Engineering or Aerospace Engineering;
You have a solid foundation in programming and implementation of algorithms;
Strong Python programming skills and fluent use of GIT;
Excellent English and Italian level, oral & written;
You have a sincere and life-guiding cooperative mindset.


In addition to the basic requirements, we will carefully evaluate these characteristics as a plus :


You have previous work experience in similar roles, including consulting experience and /or programming experience at the corporate level within production frameworks and standards;
Knowledge of Spark, SQL or any other data-oriented programming language and proficiency with standard data wrangling and modelling libraries (Pandas, Sklearn. Keras, XGBboost, LightGBM, etc.);
Experience/fluency with MIP optimization tools (CPLEX, Guroby, etc.).


Research shows that some people are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single criteria. At Prima we are committed to building diverse teams so please apply even if your past experience doesn‚Äôt align perfectly with the requirements. You might still be a great fit!

Prima is a community made up of talented and ambitious individuals. We offer equal employment opportunities and are oriented towards diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination of any kind based on race, colour, gender, religion, sexual orientation, nationality, disability, genetic information, pregnancy or other protected personal characteristics, as defined by national laws.

If it sounds like we‚Äôd be a good fit for each other, apply and join us in the fast lane.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Il Data Scientist in HRM

si occuper√† di attivit√† di data engineering, data exploration e data preparation, oltre allo sviluppo di modelli di Machine Learning. Il ruolo prevede il deployment e il monitoring delle soluzioni, personalizzate secondo le esigenze specifiche. Sar√†, inoltre, coinvolto nella realizzazione di modelli predittivi, e nella creazione di use cases di GenAI con LLM. Un altro compito fondamentale sar√† lo sviluppo di API e script per rendere operativi i modelli in maniera continuativa.

üåüSei tu?

Il nostro collega ideale, con almeno 5 anni di esperienza pregressa in ruolo analogo, dovr√† possedere le seguenti caratteristiche:


Laurea magistrale in materie STEM
Conoscenza di Python
Conoscenza di SQL e delle principali tecniche di Machine Learning / Data Mining
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (livello B2)


Nice to have:


Preferibile esperienza su attivit√† di sviluppo di modelli predittivi e/o utilizzo di LLM
Conoscenza dei moduli Python standard in ambito analytics (scikit-learn, pandas, numpy, ecc)
Conoscenza Reti Neurali e framework per loro implementazione
Conoscenza di framework BigData (Hadoop / Kafka / Spark / ecc)
Esperienza con tools di MLOps
Esperienza con strumenti di Business Intelligence (PowerBI, Board, ecc)
Conoscenza di unix, networking, docker, cloud


Competenze e capacit√† apprezzate:


Mentalit√† analitica
Capacit√† di problem solving
Propensione al lavoro in team


üåüCosa offriamo?


üåê Remote Working: Lavorare da casa con flessibilit√† e comfort.
üîÑ Diversit√† dei Progetti: Opportunit√† di lavorare su progetti brevi, mantenendo sempre fresche e stimolanti le tue attivit√† lavorative.

Title: Data Science Internship
Description:
Our Company

Technogym inspires 55 million daily users to train using our innovative & engaging solutions for fitness, sport and health. By promoting the wellness lifestyle of exercise, a balanced diet, and a positive mental approach, Technogym has rapidly grown into a success story of over 2,500 employees at 15 branches, expanding to more than 100 countries and has been selected as Official Supplier to 9 editions of the Olympic Games - from Sydney 2000 to Paris 2024.

If you are a team player with strong relationship skills and an international approach, eager to invest your energy in building dreams, you have the right spirit to join Technogym! You will naturally fit with our culture if you work out and live a healthy lifestyle, are pro-active, determined and digital savvy. Move with us for a better world!

Your Role

At Technogym, we put data at the forefront of all decisions. As a Junior Data Scientist, you will be part of a team working on data analysis and data modeling of both internal data and customer data, across all products of the Technogym Ecosystem.

In this role, you will work with a team of Data Scientists and Data Engineers and collaborate cross-functionally with Marketing, Product Marketing, and other departments working on Technogym Products. You will contribute insights to Technogym‚Äôs product strategy and direction through quantitative analysis and research.

Your Impact


Collaborate with teams in Product Marketing, Marketing, Sales, and Finance to understand business context, ideate, and deliver insights and prototypes.
Assist Data Analyst and Engineers in improving data extraction, transformation, and modeling through the design of appropriate metrics.
Provide analyses through advanced analytics/statistical methods that tell a ‚Äústory‚Äù focused on business insights.
Develop reusable and robust analytic frameworks to ensure consistent results across business areas.



About You


Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Statistics, Economics, Mathematics, or a related quantitative discipline, or equivalent practical experience.
Up to 3/4 years of experience in a Data Analyst or Data Science role, analyzing data sets to solve business problems through statistical methods and predictive analytics.
Experience with statistical software (e.g., Python), database languages (e.g., SQL), and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau).



Preferred Qualifications


Experience in data analysis, especially for time series data, to solve business problems in complex, fast-moving, and ambiguous business environments with strong data intuition and business acumen.
Experience in stakeholder-facing or client-facing roles (e.g., previous internship or consulting role).



Technogym is an Equal Opportunities Employer

Technogym is an equal opportunities employer. We welcome applications from all members of society irrespective of age, sex, sexual orientation, race, religion or belief.

Discover your potential with a career at Technogym, where work means loving what you do, taking on challenges, learning from others, sharing a vision and making it come true!
Show more

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Ciao, talento del tech! üåü

Siamo MatchGuru, piacere di conoscerti!




Ci presentiamo, come √® giusto che sia ü§ù

MatchGuru √® pi√π di una piattaforma: √® l'epicentro dove talenti e aziende si scoprono, capiscono e incontrano. Un mix (gi√† leggendario) di tecnologia e competenza, progettato per match che vanno oltre l'eccellenza. Con le nostre soluzioni tecnologiche proprietarie, acceleriamo ed efficientiamo il processo di selezione, liberandolo da rallentamenti ed errori. Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una persona da inserire come Data Scientist all‚Äôinterno del team Data Science Office. La struttura ha la responsabilit√† di garantire il monitoraggio dei progetti di Group Data Office (tempi, costi, contenuto tecnico e rispetto linee guida); consolidare i Piani di Sviluppo degli Advanced Analytics delle Business Unit; collaborare al processo di selezione degli strumenti di analytics e advanced analytics; garantire la standardizzazione e generalizzazione di metodologie basate su best practices legate agli Advanced Analytics.

A2A S.p.A.

Ti occuperai di


Esplorazione e analisi di elevate moli di dati al fine di supportare l‚Äôelaborazione delle soluzioni di Advanced Analytics
Applicazione di tecniche statistiche avanzate, machine learning supervisionato e non supervisionato, Deep Learning, Data Mining (analisi time series, alberi decisionali, algoritmi di clusterizzazione come K-mean, random forest, reti neurali‚Ä¶) e tecniche di Intelligenza Artificiale Generativa
Collaborazione attiva con il team per supportare e implementare la messa in produzione dei progetti
Partecipazione proattiva all‚Äôinnovazione e all‚Äôottimizzazione dei processi aziendali

Laurea Magistrale in Data Science, Statistica, Matematica, Fisica, Ingegneria, Informatica
Esperienza di almeno 2 anni in ambito di tecniche di Advanced Analytics, modellazione e analisi statistica di elevate moli di dati
Consolidata esperienza nella gestione di database e data warehouse su larga scala (SQL/NoSQL), e l‚Äôutilizzo di tecnologie Big Data (Spark, ...)
Conoscenza avanzata di Python e delle librerie di Machine Learning
Conoscenza dei Cloud Provider Google (GCP), Amazon (AWS) e Microsoft (Azure)
Rappresenta un requisito fondamentale pregressa esperienza in data visualization: Microsoft Power BI, Django, Flask, Dash, Shiny
Rappresenta un requisito fondamentale esperienza o conoscenza di tecniche avanzate di Machine Learning supervisionato e non supervisionato, Deep Learning, Data Mining e Generative AI
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese
Completano il profilo: forte orientamento al team working e capacit√† di interfacciarsi con interlocutori a diversi livelli, pensiero critico e capacit√† di problem solving, attitudine a lavorare in un ambiente dinamico, collaborativo con organizzazione agile (startuplike).

Title: Junior ‚Äì ML & RPA Developer ‚Äì Risk Advisory
HTML:
Stiamo cercando una figura Junior da inserire nel team Digital Controls CPP di Deloitte Risk Advisory per la sede di Milano e Roma che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Il business Digital Controls CPP si occupa di fornire servizi di Digital Transformation, che hanno l‚Äôobiettivo di supportare la digitalizzazione dei processi di business, mettendo in atto attivit√† che prevedono l‚Äôutilizzo di strumenti di Robotic Process Automation, Data Analytics, Machine Learning e AI sfruttando i principali servizi messi a disposizione dai pi√π importanti player del settore dell‚Äôautomazione di processo e cloud.

Your Role

La risorsa Junior verr√† inserita in un team di lavoro e si occuper√† di:

  • Aiutare nella progettazione e design di soluzioni IT sia di tipo applicativo che di integrazione;
  • Porter√† avanti attivit√† di troubleshooting e reverse engineering su soluzioni gi√† implementate;
  • Implementazione di nuovi processi di automazione a partire dall‚Äôanalisi di requisiti di Business fino al rilascio in produzione dopo opportuni Unit e User Acceptance Test.

Winning Requirements

  • Laurea triennale in informatica o in un campo STEM correlato;
  • Esperienza su progettualit√† di trasformazione digitale e/o automazione di processo;
  • Forte predisposizione al problem solving e mentalit√† analitica;
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese (scritta e parlata);
  • Conoscenza dei linguaggi C#, SQL, .Net‚Äô;
  • Ottime abilit√† comunicative nei confronti degli stakeholder di progetto (colleghi, cliente, etc.);
  • Voglia di imparare, propositivit√† e capacit√† di teamworking.

Make An Impact That Matters

Deloitte √® un network leader nei servizi professionali alle imprese, presente in oltre 150 Paesi con 457 mila professionisti. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e sostenibili in Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory, Tax e Legal. Il nostro obiettivo √® supportare le aziende nello sviluppo e nell'implementazione di strategie al passo con il mercato.

In Deloitte la sostenibilit√† √® un tema centrale. Per questo, attraverso le strategie e le progettualit√† legate alle tematiche Environmental, Social e Governance (ESG), ci impegniamo a promuovere una crescita responsabile, sostenibile e inclusiva per il Pianeta, le nostre persone e la societ√†. Scopri di pi√π sulle nostre strategie di Corporate Sustainability, tra cui Well-being, la strategia volta a migliorare il benessere fisico, mentale e sociale delle nostre persone, affinch√© siano felici e piene di energia in tutti gli ambiti della loro vita e WorldClimate, la strategia globale di Deloitte per diventare un‚Äôorganizzazione Net Zero e per guidare scelte responsabili all‚Äôinterno e all‚Äôesterno dell‚Äôorganizzazione.

Sei pront* a #MakeAnImpactThatMatter insieme? Candidati ora!

Le persone interessate possono inviare la propria candidatura con autorizzazione ai sensi del dlgs. 196/2003. La ricerca rispetta il d.lgs. 198/2006, il D.lgs. 215/03 e il D.lgs. 216/03 ed √® aperta a candidat* di qualsiasi orientamento o espressione di genere, orientamento sessuale, et√†, etnia e credo religioso. Il presente annuncio √® stato ideato nel rispetto della diversity e dell‚Äôinclusivit√†.

Title: Data Scientist, Sr Level 3
HTML:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design, and engineering meet at scale.

We are looking for an AI Lead to join our Data&AI Studio to drive the development of usable and effective AI solutions using Generative AI technologies.

This role requires a hands-on approach in the design and deployment of large language models (LLMs) and related AI technologies. The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading key projects and mentoring data scientists, focusing on practical AI applications that directly enhance business operations and customer experiences.

You will get the chance to:

  • Design, develop, and implement cutting-edge AI solutions, particularly generative AI models that address specific business needs;
  • Lead projects from conception to deployment, ensuring that AI solutions are robust, scalable, and seamlessly integrated into existing systems;
  • Prototype and iterate on models and algorithms to maximize effectiveness and efficiency;
  • Familiarity with SDAIA/NDMO and development of safe AI models
  • Directly mentor and direct a team of AI data scientists, fostering an environment of innovation and practical problem-solving;
  • Enhance team capabilities through regular training and hands-on workshops focused on advanced AI techniques and industry best practices;
  • Encourage a project-driven approach where team members develop tangible AI solutions that contribute to strategic goals;
  • Keep abreast of the latest developments in AI, particularly generative models;
  • Apply expert knowledge in machine learning, neural networks, and computational linguistics to develop AI solutions that are both innovative and functional;
  • Troubleshoot and optimize AI systems for better performance and accuracy.


What will help you succeed:

  • Master‚Äôs or PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or related field;
  • At least 8 years of experience in AI and machine learning, with significant hands-on experience in designing and deploying large language models;
  • Proven experience in leading AI projects and teams with a focus on delivering practical and effective solutions;
  • Strong programming skills in Python and familiarity with AI development tools and frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Hugging Face;
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to manage complex projects under tight deadlines;
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with fluency in English.


At Globant we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We encourage people to have an inclusive spirit as our global footprint expands. We seek to generate a place of inspiration and growth for everyone. A safe space, based on equity as a value, where everyone's careers can be promoted and developed in the same way. There is no innovation without diversity and there is no improvement without plurality.

This job is in ITALY

Are you ready?

Job Segment: Database, Scientific, Computer Science, Senior Scientist, Linguist, Technology, Engineering, Science, Bilingual

Title: DATA SCIENTIST - BUSINESS UNIT MERCATO
Description:
Chi cerchiamo

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una persona da inserire come Data Scientist all‚Äôinterno della struttura Data Office della Business Unit Mercato.¬†

La struttura svolge analisi avanzate sui dati con metodi di data science e machine learning, sviluppando e gestendo modelli di predizione, classificazione e segmentazione della Customer Base in grado di abilitare processi di business e promuovendo un approccio data driven che valorizzi il patrimonio informativo aziendale, favorendone l‚Äôintegrazione con diverse fonti interne e l‚Äôarricchimento con dati esterni. Analisi e modelli sono a supporto delle attivit√† commerciali ed operative delle societ√† della Business Unit Mercato, fra cui A2A Energia, NeN (Yada Energia), Energy Solutions, oltre ad altre societ√† controllate.

Per quale societ√†

L‚Äôinserimento avverr√†¬†in A2A S.p.A. per le attivit√† di Data Science della Business Unit Mercato che √® finalizzata alla vendita al dettaglio di energia elettrica e di gas naturale ai clienti del mercato libero e alla commercializzazione ai clienti serviti in regime di tutela. Inoltre, si occupa di fornire servizi di efficienza energetica e di mobilit√† elettrica.

Ti occuperai di


Data exploration & cleaning
Data enrichment da fonti dato esterne, sia strutturate che non strutturate
Analisi statistiche sui dati con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottenere insights utili al business
Supporto nelle diverse fasi di sviluppo di modelli di machine learning: feature selection & engineering, resampling & training, testing & cross validation, hyperparameters optimization, industrializzazione (MLops)
Valutazione delle prestazioni di modelli di machine learning


Sei la persona giusta se ti riconosci in questo profilo


Laurea Magistrale in discipline matematiche, statistiche o ingegneristiche
Esperienza pregressa di 1-2 anni nel campo dell‚Äôanalisi dati in aziende del settore Energy/Utility, TLC o in aziende di consulenza per clienti finali in questi settori
Esperienza in strumenti e tecniche di data exploration, data mining e machine learning
Conoscenza pratica dei linguaggi R e Python
Conoscenza pratica dei database relazionali e del linguaggio SQL
Conoscenza pratica di almeno una piattaforma cloud (GCP, AWS, MS Azure), con preferenza per Google Cloud Platform

HTML:
Chi cerchiamo

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una persona da inserire come Data Scientist all‚Äôinterno della struttura Data Office della Business Unit Mercato. 

La struttura svolge analisi avanzate sui dati con metodi di data science e machine learning, sviluppando e gestendo modelli di predizione, classificazione e segmentazione della Customer Base in grado di abilitare processi di business e promuovendo un approccio data driven che valorizzi il patrimonio informativo aziendale, favorendone l‚Äôintegrazione con diverse fonti interne e l‚Äôarricchimento con dati esterni. Analisi e modelli sono a supporto delle attivit√† commerciali ed operative delle societ√† della Business Unit Mercato, fra cui A2A Energia, NeN (Yada Energia), Energy Solutions, oltre ad altre societ√† controllate.

Per quale societ√†

L‚Äôinserimento avverr√† in A2A S.p.A. per le attivit√† di Data Science della Business Unit Mercato che √® finalizzata alla vendita al dettaglio di energia elettrica e di gas naturale ai clienti del mercato libero e alla commercializzazione ai clienti serviti in regime di tutela. Inoltre, si occupa di fornire servizi di efficienza energetica e di mobilit√† elettrica.

Ti occuperai di
  • Data exploration & cleaning
  • Data enrichment da fonti dato esterne, sia strutturate che non strutturate
  • Analisi statistiche sui dati con l‚Äôobiettivo di ottenere insights utili al business
  • Supporto nelle diverse fasi di sviluppo di modelli di machine learning: feature selection & engineering, resampling & training, testing & cross validation, hyperparameters optimization, industrializzazione (MLops)
  • Valutazione delle prestazioni di modelli di machine learning


Sei la persona giusta se ti riconosci in questo profilo
  • Laurea Magistrale in discipline matematiche, statistiche o ingegneristiche
  • Esperienza pregressa di 1-2 anni nel campo dell‚Äôanalisi dati in aziende del settore Energy/Utility, TLC o in aziende di consulenza per clienti finali in questi settori
  • Esperienza in strumenti e tecniche di data exploration, data mining e machine learning
  • Conoscenza pratica dei linguaggi R e Python
  • Conoscenza pratica dei database relazionali e del linguaggio SQL
  • Conoscenza pratica di almeno una piattaforma cloud (GCP, AWS, MS Azure), con preferenza per Google Cloud Platform
  • Capacit√† di lettura e comprensione di documentazione tecnica in lingua inglese
  • Rappresenta un plus la conoscenza dei principali strumenti di CI/CD (Docker, Git)
  • Completano il profilo: curiosit√†, attitudine all‚Äôapprendimento, proattivit√†, predisposizione al lavoro in team e alla condivisione delle informazioni

Title: Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence Engineer - Milano [CNS]
HTML:
Vuoi essere al centro di prospettive di crescita uniche? Entra nella practice Technology Consulting di PwC e diventa:

Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence Engineer

YOUR PERSPECTIVE

Farai parte del nostro ML & AI Ops team, focalizzato nella gestione di sfidanti progetti di Digital Transformation per i principali players in ambito Automotive & Industrial Manufacturing, consumer Markets, Energy & Utilities , Financial Services, Telco & Media attraverso lo sviluppo, l‚Äôefficientamento e la reingegnerizzazione del ciclo di vita del software e dei modelli/algoritmi.

Le Tue Attivit√† Saranno

  • supportare il cliente nella definizione del design del software e nelle attivit√† di application performance management;
  • raccogliere i requisiti di integrazione sia dal punto di vista tecnico che funzionale interfacciandosi anche con gli altri team di PwC;
  • realizzare le data pipeline attraverso le principali tecnologie Python/PySpark/Spark/Scala/R e sulle principali data platform (GCP/Azure/AWS/Palantir);
  • presidiare e garantire i processi di CI/CD/CT e di software life cycle management;

YOUR UNIQUE STRENGHT

  • Sei laureato/a in una disciplina STEM o in particolare in uno dei seguenti corsi di laurea: Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica, Ingegneria Elettronica o dell'Automazione;
  • Hai conoscenza specifica di una delle principali tecnologie/piattaforme tra Python/PySpark/Spark/Scala/R e Google/Azure/Aws/Palantir;
  • Hai esperienze con strumenti come MLFlow, KubeFlow, AirFlow o simili;
  • Il possesso di certificazioni in una delle piattaforme tra quelle sopra indicate costituisce un plus;
  • Hai una buona conoscenza dei pi√π comuni RDBMS;
  • Hai una comprensione generale dei fondamenti del ciclo di vita delle API;
  • Hai una comprensione generale degli argomenti relativi alle infrastrutture/architetture;
  • Hai una buona conoscenza degli strumenti di gestione del ciclo di vita del software/modello (Git, CI/CD /CT).

Title: DATA SCIENTIST - BIDDING & DISPATCHING
Description:
Chi cerchiamo

Per la nostra sede di Milano siamo alla ricerca di una persona da inserire come Data Scientist - Bidding & Dispatching all‚Äôinterno della struttura Modelli e Algoritmi di Programmazione e Dispacciamento struttura che ha lo scopo di implementare e presidiare l'evoluzione dei modelli e degli algoritmi a supporto della programmazione di breve e medio termine e del dispacciamento degli impianti idroelettrici, termoelettrici e rinnovabili.

Per quale Business Unit

L‚Äôinserimento √® previsto all‚Äôinterno della Business Unit Generazione & Trading, la cui attivit√† √® relativa alla gestione del portafoglio impianti di generazione del Gruppo con il duplice scopo di massimizzare la disponibilit√† e l‚Äôefficienza degli impianti, minimizzando i costi di esercizio e manutenzione (O&M) e di massimizzare il profitto derivante dalla gestione del portafoglio energetico attraverso l‚Äôattivit√† di compravendita di energia elettrica, di combustibili (gassosi e non gassosi) e di titoli ambientali sui mercati all‚Äôingrosso nazionali ed esteri.

Rientra nell‚Äôambito della Business Unit anche l‚Äôattivit√† di trading sui mercati nazionali ed esteri di tutte le commodity energetiche (gas, energia elettrica, titoli ambientali).

Ti occuperai di

Partecipazione attivamente nell‚Äôimplementazione di modelli software di rappresentazione degli impianti idroelettrici, termoelettrici e a fonti rinnovabili del parco centrali della BU.
Sviluppare algoritmi finalizzati al supporto delle attivit√† di bidding e alla realizzazione delle strategie di posizionamento sul mercato.
Analisi, elaborazione, sintesi e condivisione dei dati raccolti.
Raccogliere ed organizzare i dati storici di impianti e mercati.
Studiare e analizzare le evoluzioni normative dei mercati elettrici (ARERA, Terna, GME).
Modellistica e supporto per migliorare il dispacciamento degli impianti.




Sei la persona giusta se ti riconosci in questo profilo

Laurea in Matematica, Fisica o Ingegneria matematica.
Preferibile esperienza pregressa di 1 o 2 anni come Business Analyst o Data Analyst.
Interesse per il mondo energy/ambiente/sostenibilit√†.
Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto Office (Excel e VBA)
Costituisce titolo preferenziale la conoscenza di linguaggi di programmazione (es. Matlab, Python).
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.
Completano il profilo: capacit√† di analisi e attitudine al problem solving




Saranno valutate esclusivamente le candidature inviate tramite il Sito Carriere aziendale.

Ci impegniamo ogni giorno per creare un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo e innovativo, fondato sul rispetto, sull‚Äôetica e sulle pari opportunit√† garantendo la valorizzazione delle diversit√†.

Title: MR Clinical Research Scientist - Southern Europe
Description:
Job Description Summary

As an MR Clinical Research Scientist, you will distinguish yourself through MR research collaboration. In close partnership with Southern European clinical and academic research partners - as well as GE Healthcare colleagues - you will be responsible for exploring, developing, and validating advanced MR imaging applications - ultimately driving their translation into product solutions.

Job Description

Essential Responsibilities


Leverage educational qualifications to develop and deliver new or improved MR applications.
Support MR research partners, with emphasis on key academic and clinical sites in Southern Europe.
Advise colleagues in Product Marketing and Applications on new technical and clinical innovations which can be developed into new products. Leverage expertise to move project initiatives forward
Assist in writing research proposals, journal publications, and technical documents.
Participate in customer presentations and scanner demonstrations.


Qualifications/Requirements


Ph.D. (or M.Sc. with equivalent experience) in Physics, Chemistry, Life Sciences, Computer Science, Biomedical/Electrical/Software Engineering, or related field
Demonstrated record of innovation and development
Strong regional (Spanish/Italian) language, oral and written communication skills. English fluency also required.
Can-do attitude. Flexible, intellectually curious, and able to work with cross-functional, global teams.
Quality, Compliance, and Continuous Improvement focus
Willingness to travel 30% of time.


Desired Characteristics


3+ years of experience in MR imaging research or closely related field
Experience in a clinical environment (e.g. radiology or cardiology department)
Experience in pulse sequence modification and/or recon programming
Programming experience in C/C++
Experience with academic and/or clinical research collaborations
Candidates with MR experience in a specific application area (neuro, body, cardiac, vascular, msk) are especially welcome


Inclusion and Diversity

GE HealthCare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

Behaviors

We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership ‚Äì always with unyielding integrity.

Total Rewards

Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you‚Äôd expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you‚Äôll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

Additional Information

Relocation Assistance Provided: No

Title: Junior Software Engineer
Description:
At Bending Spoons, we‚Äôre striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.




To achieve this mission, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform‚Äîwhich comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor‚Äôs attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.




For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That‚Äôs our promise to such a candidate.




We're seeking exceptional engineers interested in working in backend, data, infrastructure, mobile, or security & privacy. Don‚Äôt worry if you are not sure about what area would suit you best: We‚Äôll have time to determine what‚Äôs likely to be the ideal fit for you.




No matter your seniority, you will work on production code, directly improving our products or adding new exceptional features. At the moment, most teams use Python, Typescript, or Java for the backend, and Kotlin and Swift for mobile. Our approach to software development is highly flexible, and we adapt our tech stack to the needs of the different products.




A few examples of your responsibilities

Work closely with other software engineers to expand our set of libraries and make our processes ever-more efficient.
Learn about the latest and greatest technologies, testing the promising ones to make sure we don‚Äôt miss out on game-changing opportunities to boost our productivity and the enjoyment of our work.
Constantly improve the quality of our products, tools, or infrastructures by fixing bugs and refactoring the code base where necessary.




What we look for

Reasoning ability. Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
Drive. You‚Äôre extremely ambitious in everything you do‚Äîand your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high‚Äîand rising‚Äîbar.
Team spirit. You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You‚Äôre reliable, honest, and transparent.
Proficiency in English. You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.




What we offer

Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams. You‚Äôll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
An exceptional opportunity for growth. We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential‚Äîthen, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of ‚Ç¨63,965. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between ‚Ç¨105,737 and ‚Ç¨143,330. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.




Commitment & contract

Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time.




Location

Milan (Italy) or fully remote.




Before you apply

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We‚Äôre extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply.




The selection process

We welcome applications in English and Italian. If you pass our screening, we‚Äôll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you‚Äôre successful with those, we‚Äôll invite you to a series of interviews.




Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested at accommodations-ext@bendingspoons.com.




Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn‚Äôt a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you‚Äôve got what it takes, you‚Äôll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
  • Competitive pay and access to equity in the company. Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of ‚Ç¨63,965. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between ‚Ç¨105,737 and ‚Ç¨143,330. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
  • All. These. Benefits. Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


Commitment & contract

Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time.


Location

Milan (Italy) or fully remote.


Before you apply

Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We‚Äôre extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply.


The selection process

We welcome applications in English and Italian. If you pass our screening, we‚Äôll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you‚Äôre successful with those, we‚Äôll invite you to a series of interviews.


Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested at accommodations-ext@bendingspoons.com.


Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn‚Äôt a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Technical Specialist
Description:
Role Purpose

Artificial intelligence evolution for the fixed network solutions fulfilment for PA customers

Key Accountabilities And Decision Ownership


Autonomy: Ability to work independently and make informed decisions
Problem Solving: Skill in effectively solving complex problems
Time Management: Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines
Communication: Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with the team
Continuous Learning: Willingness to continuously learn and update technical skills



Core Competencies, Knowledge And Experience


Programming Languages: Deep knowledge of PHP and Python
Database Management: Proficiency in data manipulation, including structured data tools (e.g., SQL) and unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)
Artificial Intelligence: Advanced skills in artificial intelligence, particularly in machine learning and generative AI. Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Pytorch, H20) and fundamental techniques (e.g., clustering, regression, time-series analysis)
Frameworks and Libraries: Familiarity with major frameworks and libraries for PHP, Python, and AI
Experience: At least 5 years of experience in software development roles, preferably in AI-related contexts



Must Have Technical / Professional Qualifications


Deep knowledge of IP-networking (CISCO certifications or equivalents are preferred)
Knowledge of IT process development (ITIL certification is preferred)
NP procedures according to regulatory constraints (optional)
Engineering degree or equivalent
3 years on Tech companies / software house



Key performance indicators


Compliance with PA activation plans
Compliance with SLA on customer activation and GNP for PA
Technical NPS and delivery quality indicators for PA

Title: Generative AI Engineer
Description:
Joining Capco means joining an organisation that is committed to an inclusive working environment where you‚Äôre encouraged to #BeYourselfAtWork. We celebrate individuality and recognize that diversity and inclusion, in all forms, is critical to success. It‚Äôs important to us that we recruit and develop as diverse a range of talent as we can and we believe that everyone brings something different to the table ‚Äì so we‚Äôd love to know what makes you different. Such differences may mean we need to make changes to our process to allow you the best possible platform to succeed, and we are happy to cater to any reasonable adjustments you may require. You will find the section to let us know of these at the bottom of your application form or you can mention it directly to your recruiter at any stage and they will be happy to help.




About Capco

Capco is a global technology and business consultancy, focused on the financial services sector. We are growing at fast pace in our Italian office, the opportunity for growth is large, accessible, and immediate. We are passionate about helping our clients succeed in an ever-changing industry. Capco is going through a significant growth journey, now is a very good time to join us as we expand our consulting team in Italy.




Role Description:

We are looking for a Generative AI Engineer to join our Data Analytics and AI team. You will be part of the GenAI workforce, responsible for defining strategy for Generative AI internally, and also helping shape and execute clients‚Äô AI transformation agendas. You should have a strong background in machine learning/deep learning/AI and software engineering, and extensive professional experience as either as a consultant or similar advisory corporate role.

Responsibilities

Identify critical business problems that could be solved using Generative AI
Define strategy for Generative AI and how to apply it
Lead the design and build, and be responsible for engineering innovative GenAI products together with our cross-functional team
Continually iterate and scale Generative AI products, whilst listening to the needs of the clients. Create technical standards and blueprint for AI scenarios
Educate the organization both from IT and the business perspectives on Generative AI
Mentor and nurture other engineers to help them grow their skills and expertise




Skills and Experience

Essential skills to succeed

Experience working with large-scale language models
Rich understanding of language models and transformers, vector stores and search algorithms
Large-scale ETL development and engineering experience of high performance, large-scale ML systems
Strong working knowledge of modern software development methodologies and software design pattern (e.g. end-to-end CI/CD process)
Ability to communicate technical concepts effectively to client and partner teams.
Confidence to convey technical advice and guidance to clients.




Bonus points

Financial services industry experience
Experience building applications and use appropriate prompting on generative AI models.
You are a contributor to opensource and always thinking out of the box tooling, using and standardizing with methods of creating APIs, ML/Ops automation and more.
Cloud fundamental or architecture accreditations




Why join Capco?

You will work on engaging projects with some of the largest banks in the world, on projects that will transform the financial services industry.

We offer:

A work culture focused on innovation and building lasting value for our clients and employees
Ongoing learning opportunities to help you acquire new skills or deepen existing expertise
A flat, non-hierarchical structure that will enable you to work with senior partners and directly with clients
A diverse, inclusive, meritocratic culture




Location: Piazza Gae Aulenti 1, Milan

Title: Sr. Data Scientist, Generative AI Innovation Center
Description:
Description

Are you looking to work at the forefront of Machine Learning and AI? Would you be excited to apply cutting edge Generative AI algorithms to solve real world problems with significant impact? The Generative AI Innovation Center at AWS is a new strategic team that helps AWS customers implement Generative AI solutions and realize transformational business opportunities. This is a team of strategists, data scientists, engineers, and solution architects working step-by-step with customers to build bespoke solutions that harness the power of generative AI.

You will work directly with customers and innovate in a fast-paced organization that contributes to game-changing projects and technologies. You will design and run experiments, research new algorithms, and find new ways of optimizing risk, profitability, and customer experience.

We‚Äôre looking for Senior Data Scientists capable of using GenAI and other techniques to design, evangelize, and implement state-of-the-art solutions for never-before-solved problems.

AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.

Key job responsibilities

As a Senior Data Scientist, you will


Collaborate with AI/ML scientists and architects to Research, design, develop, and evaluate cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges
Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths to production
Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction


About The Team

The team helps customers imagine and scope the use cases that will create the greatest value for their businesses, select and train and fine tune the right models, define paths to navigate technical or business challenges, develop proof-of-concepts, and make plans for launching solutions at scale. The GenAI Innovation Center team provides guidance on best practices for applying generative AI responsibly and cost efficiently.

Diverse Experiences

Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn‚Äôt followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don‚Äôt let it stop you from applying.

Why AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world‚Äôs most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating ‚Äî that‚Äôs why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.

Work/Life Balance

We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there‚Äôs nothing we can‚Äôt achieve in the cloud.

Inclusive Team Culture

Here at AWS, it‚Äôs in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.

Mentorship and Career Growth

We‚Äôre continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth‚Äôs Best Employer. That‚Äôs why you‚Äôll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.

Basic Qualifications


Master's degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, mathematics, data science, business analytics, economics, finance, engineering, or computer science
Relevant experience in building large scale machine learning or deep learning models
Experience communicating across technical and non-technical audiences
Experience in using Python and hands on experience building models with deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, MXNet
Fluency in written and spoken English


Preferred Qualifications


Knowledge of AWS tech stack (e.g., AWS Redshift, S3, EC2, Glue)
PhD degree in Computer Science, or related technical, math, or scientific field
Proven knowledge of Generative AI and hands-on experience of building applications with large foundation models
Proven knowledge of AWS platform and tools
Hands-on experience of building ML solutions on AWS
High impact thought leadership in AI/ML space through blog posts, public presentations, social media visibility, or publications.


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.


Company - AWS EMEA SARL (Italy Branch)

Job ID: A2653743
Show more
HTML:
Description

Are you looking to work at the forefront of Machine Learning and AI? Would you be excited to apply cutting edge Generative AI algorithms to solve real world problems with significant impact? The Generative AI Innovation Center at AWS is a new strategic team that helps AWS customers implement Generative AI solutions and realize transformational business opportunities. This is a team of strategists, data scientists, engineers, and solution architects working step-by-step with customers to build bespoke solutions that harness the power of generative AI.

You will work directly with customers and innovate in a fast-paced organization that contributes to game-changing projects and technologies. You will design and run experiments, research new algorithms, and find new ways of optimizing risk, profitability, and customer experience.

We‚Äôre looking for Senior Data Scientists capable of using GenAI and other techniques to design, evangelize, and implement state-of-the-art solutions for never-before-solved problems.

AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.

Key job responsibilities

As a Senior Data Scientist, you will

  • Collaborate with AI/ML scientists and architects to Research, design, develop, and evaluate cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges
  • Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths to production
  • Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
  • Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction

About The Team

The team helps customers imagine and scope the use cases that will create the greatest value for their businesses, select and train and fine tune the right models, define paths to navigate technical or business challenges, develop proof-of-concepts, and make plans for launching solutions at scale. The GenAI Innovation Center team provides guidance on best practices for applying generative AI responsibly and cost efficiently.

Diverse Experiences

Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn‚Äôt followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don‚Äôt let it stop you from applying.

Why AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world‚Äôs most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating ‚Äî that‚Äôs why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.

Work/Life Balance

We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there‚Äôs nothing we can‚Äôt achieve in the cloud.

Inclusive Team Culture

Here at AWS, it‚Äôs in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.

Mentorship and Career Growth

We‚Äôre continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth‚Äôs Best Employer. That‚Äôs why you‚Äôll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.

Basic Qualifications

  • Master's degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, mathematics, data science, business analytics, economics, finance, engineering, or computer science
  • Relevant experience in building large scale machine learning or deep learning models
  • Experience communicating across technical and non-technical audiences
  • Experience in using Python and hands on experience building models with deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, MXNet
  • Fluency in written and spoken English

Preferred Qualifications

  • Knowledge of AWS tech stack (e.g., AWS Redshift, S3, EC2, Glue)
  • PhD degree in Computer Science, or related technical, math, or scientific field
  • Proven knowledge of Generative AI and hands-on experience of building applications with large foundation models
  • Proven knowledge of AWS platform and tools
  • Hands-on experience of building ML solutions on AWS
  • High impact thought leadership in AI/ML space through blog posts, public presentations, social media visibility, or publications.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.


Company - AWS EMEA SARL (Italy Branch)

Job ID: A2653743

Title: Project Developer
Description:
Job Title: Project Developer - Battery Storage




Location: Milan, Italy




Who are we recruiting for?

We are on the hunt for a successful and motivated Renewable Energy Business Development Leader on behalf of our client, a global leader in the battery storage sector. This is a unique opportunity for an accomplished professional to join a vibrant and growing team dedicated to advancing the renewable energy landscape across Europe.




What will you be doing?

As a Renewable Energy Business Development Leader, you will be:

Originating and managing large-scale Battery Storage and Solar-plus-Storage project development opportunities, ensuring site control, interconnection, and permitting processes are successfully navigated.
Directing project development activities to achieve Notice to Proceed (NTP) status by leading relationships with developers, authorities, landowners, grid operators, offtakers, and advisors.
Leading commercial negotiations and deal structuring for project acquisitions or partnership agreements, such as Development Services Agreements or Joint Development Agreements.
Coordinating with cross-functional teams, including Legal, Technical Solution, Finance, and Project Delivery, to ensure project success.
Driving financial modeling efforts to assess and optimize project economics.
Prospecting and securing greenfield and brownfield sites for future development.
Staying informed on market developments, industry policies, and regulations to identify and capitalize on new business opportunities.




Are you the ideal candidate?

You are the ideal candidate if you have:

A strong track record of successfully negotiating and closing commercial transactions with stakeholders such as Landlords, Developers, Utilities, Technical Advisors, Regulatory Agencies, and Offtakers.
A BS degree (MBA or relevant master‚Äôs degree preferred).
Deep knowledge of the Solar/Storage industry, including regional regulations and market mechanisms.
Experience in areas like IPP project acquisition, community solar, national and regional grid analysis, multinational environments, legal frameworks, and full-cycle development is highly desirable.




What‚Äôs in it for you?

Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses.
Significant opportunities for career growth within a global leader in renewable energy.
Comprehensive benefits package, including pension, healthcare, and childcare vouchers.
A dynamic and supportive company culture that values innovation and sustainability.
The chance to lead groundbreaking projects that contribute to the global transition to clean energy.




Who are we?

Executive Integrity is a global executive search and recruitment consultancy for a more sustainable world with a focus on talent within the Maritime and Renewable Energy sectors. We give a proportion of all our profits to Renewable World, a charity that develops affordable and innovative renewable energy solutions to poverty-stricken communities.

Inclusyon √® la societ√† di ricerca e selezione specializzata nel recruiting di personale qualificato appartenente alle categorie protette.
